channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ahead of the holidays, consumer and child advocacy groups warn against AI toys
item.description: The child advocacy nonprofit Fairplay issued an advisory on Thursday warning people against buying AI toys this holiday season. It's not the only grou...

item.title: DOJ case against Comey faces troubles. And, powerful figures in latest Epstein docs
item.description: The DOJ's case against former FBI Director James Comey faces new challenges. And, newly released emails name powerful figures who stayed close to Jeff...

item.title: Surf's down! Munich, until now an inland surfing hotspot, has lost its biggest wave
item.description: Munich's famous river wave, the Eisbachwelle, vanished after a dredging in early November. Authorities are working to resurrect the beloved wave but i...

item.title: She cares for her aging parents full time. That requires taking care of herself, too
item.description: Dawnita Brown left her job to become a caregiver for her parents. Brown says it's a gift to care for her parents, but it can also be difficult. That's...

item.title: Eating just a handful of plastic can be fatal for marine animals, a study finds
item.description: Scientists have long known that plastic waste is bad for marine animals. A new study quantifies how little ingested plastic it takes to be a lethal do...

item.title: More than 250 arrested in Charlotte as US immigration crackdown escalates
item.description: Charlotte's Democratic leaders say border agents are "stoking fear" in the city.

item.title: Alleged mastermind behind Mexican mayor's murder arrested
item.description: The assassination of Uruapan mayor Carlos Manzo at a Day of the Dead ceremony triggered mass protests.

item.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
item.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

item.title: Employers added 119,000 jobs in September, latest employment report shows
item.description: The September jobs report, which was delayed due to the government shutdown, comes amid a slowdown in hiring across the U.S.

item.title: Nigerian separatist leader sentenced to life for terrorism
item.description: Nnamdi Kanu is found guilty of inciting violence as part of his campaign for a separate state in south-east Nigeria.

item.title: Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of ‘Swamp Sweep’ immigration crackdown
Potential loophole in the Epstein files bill that Trump signed
item.description: President Trump has signed the Epstein Files Transparency Act, but there are questions about a potential loophole that the Department of Justice may u...

item.title: What do we know about the Epstein files?
item.description: US President Donald Trump has approved a bill that orders the release of material from investigations into Epstein, the late sex offender.

item.title: New jobs report beats expectations but the unemployment rate is still rising
item.description: The delayed September jobs report beat expectations with 119,000 jobs added among employers, but the unemployment rate still rose. CBS News' Kelly O'G...

item.title: Border Patrol is monitoring US drivers and detaining those with ‘suspicious’ travel patterns
item.description: The U.S. Border Patrol is monitoring millions of American drivers nationwide in a secretive program to identify and detain people whose travel pattern...

item.title: Cheney's funeral is being held today. Here's who's speaking and how to watch.
item.description: Cheney, a dominant figure in Republican politics for more than three decades, died on Nov. 3 at age 84.

item.title: Watch: Dick Cheney's funeral being held at Washington's National Cathedral
item.description: Former Presidents George W. Bush and Joe Biden are attending the funeral for former Vice President Dick Cheney, who died at the age of 84.

item.title: A bipartisan show of respect and remembrance is set for Dick Cheney’s funeral, absent Trump
